transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Yeah hi ma'am. Very good morning. Kaisi hain aap?
Customer: Good.
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haanji ma'am bataiye.
Executive: Yeah actually ma'am IndiaMART se baat kar rahi thi main Shradha Singh manager. Aap logo ka ek catalog run karana IndiaMART se ATM catalog products karke, right?
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Hai na? So abhi services aap hi dekhti hain ma'am?
Customer: Haan wohi matlab dekhti main hi hoon, husband dekhte hain batao aap. 
Executive: Achha aapke husband dekhte hain. Okay so kab tak baat ho sakti hai aapke husband se kyunki aap mujhe batao main bhi dekhti hoon, aap mujhe batao main bhi dekhti hoon aap batao kis vajah se call kiya. 
Executive: Main batati hoon. Actually kya tha ki last time 7th November ko Shradha ne baat ki thi unse services se related. To wahan pe na unhone not satisfied mark kiya hai services mein. To basically mujhe usi se related discussion karna tha unse. So that's why maine aapko call kiya tha.
Customer: Ah ma'am wohi tha ki leads proper aate nahi hain. Leads matlab woh na matlab aise hi leads aate hain inquiries ke liye koi aise genuine lead nahi aati.
Executive: Okay. So isse related to already matlab kai bari discussion hua hai. Already I think aap logo ke yahan pe koi madam bhi hain na jo services ko handle karti hain.
Customer: Haanji haanji haanji haanji haanji.
Executive: Okay. Okay so unke saath mera bhi kai bari discussion hua hai aapke catalog ko leke jahan pe humne proper discussion kiya hai ki humen catalog pe kaam kaise karna hai. Right? Even agar aap market agar aapne IndiaMART ka dekha hoga tab to bahut achhi baat hai aur agar nahi dekha hoga aapne to main aapko ek baar request karungi ma'am ki aap ek bari on video meet connect hoke na aap IndiaMART ka market dekho ki aapka jo product line hai us product line mein IndiaMART portal par kya market hai. Right? Even maine kai bari aap logo ko I think bola bhi tha ki ek bari try karo aap log jaise common group hum create hum already create karte hain jahan pe hum buyleads vgera aap logo ko bhejte hain. Right? Ab wahan pe agar aap buyleads consume karke aur agar aap mujhe feedback provide kara payiye to main aage koi action le paungi. Right? Kyunki yahan pe already
Customer: Haan aaj afternoon mein dekhte hain aaj topic mein dekh ke phir dekhte hain. 
Executive: Theek hai to matlab main aapko to matlab main aapko afternoon tak call karu, right?
Customer: Haanji haanji ma'am.
Executive: Theek hai kyunki mere ko bhi ek baar proper discussion karna tha ma'am kyunki main bhi aapke categories se related thoda discussion karna chah rahi thi ki aap buyleads consume ho rahi hai and all, theek hai? To main ek baar afternoon mein aapko call karti hoon. Matlab main 3:00 baje tak connect karu to chalega na?
Customer: Haanji haanji haanji haanji haanji.
Executive: Theek hai main aapko ek baar 3:00 baje connect karne ka try karti hoon. To us time aap se hi baat hogi ya phir aapke husband se hogi?
Customer: Nahi ho jayegi aap baat kar lena.
Executive: Theek hai main 3:00 baje tak call karti hoon.
Customer: Okay. Okay ma'am okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads are not genuine, only inquiries.

- Dissatisfied with the services.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a video meet to show market.

- Executive asked to consume buyleads and provide feedback.

- Executive will call back in the afternoon.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 3:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, services, follow up
